name: florence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the central part of Italy: The art galleries of Florence are too dry and demanding for most children. Their home is fabulous, a house high on the hills above Florence.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Florence the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Florence.Lorenzo de' Medici supported artists such as Botticelli, Michelangelo and Leonardo da Vinci, making Florence the cultural capital of Europe.He moved to Florence in 1837, where he established himself as an outstanding sculptor.
